import React, { useState,useEffect } from "react" import "./FeaturedCollectionSection.css" import productImg from "./images/headset.jpg"; export default function FeaturedCollections() { const [products, setProducts] = useState([]); //init it with empty array useEffect(() => { async function fetchProducts() { try { const response = await fetch('https://fakestoreapi.com/products?category_not_in="electronics"') const data = await response.json(); setProducts(data); console.log(data) } catch (error) { console.log("error to fetch the data") } } fetchProducts(); }, []) return (

Featured Collections

{products.map((product)=>(
{product.title}
{product.price}
))} {/*

100$

) }
